cells.data:
*circumpolar* stars never set at a particular latitude
Number of circumpolar stars increases as you move N
0% of stars circumpolar for people at equator

##Why do we Care?
Helps us determine *location* and *time*
Day: approximate time for Earth to make one full rotation around it's axis
Month: approximate time of one lunar cycle
Year: approximate time for Earth to make one full revolution around the Sun
